Staggered.name: Staggered
Staggered.description: Character loses their next Major Action.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: Character is lying on the ground. Melee attacks against them have Advantage, Ranged attacks against them have Disadvantage. Movement costs double. Requires action to stand.

Bleeding.name: Bleeding
Bleeding.description: Character takes 3 damage at the start of their turn.

Nausea.name: Nausea
Nausea.description: Character suffers a -2 penalty on all attack rolls.

Shaken.name: Shaken
Shaken.description: Character suffers penalties due to fear or shock.

Immobilized.name: Immobilized
Immobilized.description: Character cannot move from their current position.

Threat Zone.name: Threat Zone
Threat Zone.description: Enemies leaving a 3m radius provoke an attack of opportunity.

Grappled.name: Grappled
Grappled.description: Restrained by another. -5 penalty to Max Vigor (Stamina).

Broken Arm.name: Broken Arm
Broken Arm.description: Severe injury to the arm. Reduces Max Vigor (Stamina) by 5.
